DOC.brief_summary: AIM : To determine efficacy cold saline irrigation reduction post operative pain follow root canal therapy . METHODOLOGY : Forty patient require root canal treatment permanent single root teeth include . The patient assign randomly two group 20 patient . The teeth Group1 ( n = 20 ) irrigate use normal saline solution , whilst Group 2 ( n = 20 ) irrigate cold saline solution store 4 degree centigrade . A Heft Parker visual analog scale use measure pre-operative pain post-obturation pain 12 , 24,48 72 hour obturation . Chi square test Mann Whitney U test use statistical analysis .
